short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up any vocab in Jisho with a simple enter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're ever curious about the definition of a Japanese word while reading articles or studying, just highlight and press enter to see the definition open up in a new tab on Jisho. This can be done for any English words that you want to know in Japanese as well. 

Instead of opening up a new tab and typing it into Jisho each time you're curious about a new word, this should save time and effort and make learning as easy and quick as pressing the enter key.
